text: David Nizaam "Brownsound" Baksh (born 26 July, 1980 in Ajax, Ontario) is a Canadian guitarist, singer and producer of Guyanese descent, best known as the former guitarist of successful pop punk band Sum 41, but has since became a singer/guitarist in his own heavy metal/reggae project Brown Brigade. Category:Canadian guitarists Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Ontario
title: Dave Baksh
